data.name: Metaphysic Test Dataset for C2PA
data.description: The dataset represents a given identity's biometric features captured on video footage. It is designed to test C2PA (Coalition for Content Provenance and Authenticity) implementation across machine learning face-swap datasets.
data.citation: Metaphysic Test Dataset for C2PA, Metaphysic.ai, 2024.

data.data_source: The videos were sourced from controlled environments to ensure high-quality biometric data representation.
data.collection_period: The specific period of data collection is not provided.
data.privacy_consent: The dataset was created with the consent of all individuals whose biometric data is represented, adhering to privacy and data protection standards.

data.preprocessing_steps: The dataset was created by splitting a single footage into three separate files for training, evaluation, and test purposes.
data.tools_Libraries_used: Custom scripts were used for splitting the footage into the respective files without compromising the integrity and quality of the video data.

data.intended_use: To test C2PA implementation across ML face-swap datasets for model trainings and model outputs.
data.use_case_examples: Ideal for researchers and developers working on content authenticity, digital forensics, and the development of tools to detect deepfakes.
data.limitations: The dataset, while comprehensive, might not cover all possible variations and scenarios encountered in real-world settings. Users are advised to complement this dataset with other datasets for robust testing.
data.licensing: Open-source. Users are free to use, modify, and distribute the dataset with attribution.

data.ethical_risks: There is a risk of misuse if the dataset is used to develop technology for unauthorized surveillance or privacy invasion.
data.mitigation_strategies: The dataset is intended for academic and research purposes only. Users are encouraged to adhere to ethical guidelines and respect privacy rights when using this dataset.
